mapper.select: SELECT a.YWXH,a.DWID,c.DWMC,a.BBRQ,a.JBR,a.BLRQ,b.SCRQ, b.ZFJE,a.FUYAN,b.FFFS,c.SSQX FROM GR_YLZF_YMX a LEFT JOIN YL_ZFYB b on a.YWXH = b.YWXH LEFT JOIN DW_XX c on a.DWID = c.DWID WHERE a.JBR <> 'sys'

SELECT a.YWXH,a.DWID,c.DWMC,a.BBRQ,a.JBR,a.BLRQ,b.SCRQ, b.ZFJE,a.FUYAN,b.FFFS,c.SSQX FROM GR_YLZF_YMX a LEFT JOIN YL_ZFYB b on a.YWXH = b.YWXH LEFT JOIN DW_XX c on a.DWID = c.DWID WHERE a.JBR <> 'sys'
